title: Drawing, "Lucifer Appearing to Dante and Virgil"
medium: Pen and brown ink, brown wash
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description:
Two scenes on verso: at left - St. Christopher nearing the left bank of a river, by which a woman stands near a lantern
                                           at right: the Virgin holds the Child standing on her lap

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lucifer Appearing to Dante and Virgil".
Pen and brown ink, brown wash. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2645.
